project1.title: Smart Urban Experience App
project1.description: An innovative app that connects citizens to essential public services, real-time alerts, and local opportunities. Simplifying access to health, education, employment, and social programs, all in one place.
subDescription: Built with React Native and Expo, ensuring high performance and cross-platform compatibility.
Secure user authentication and data privacy compliance.
Centralizes health, education, employment, and social services for easy access.
Empowers users to participate with suggestions and stay informed about city updates.

project2.title: Capsule Time Platform
project2.description: A web platform to schedule messages for your future self, delivered by email on the date you choose.
subDescription: Developed with React and Node.js/Express for a seamless learning experience.
Automatic delivery of scheduled messages via email through SendGrid integration.
Intuitive interface for registration, login, scheduling, editing, and deleting messages.
Dashboard for complete management of your future messages.
